DOC.brief_title: A Mono-center Study Healthy Volunteers Comparative Bioavailability Pletal 100 mg Tablets New Pletal 100 mg Orodispersible Tablet ( ODT ) , This Latter Fasting Conditions With Without Water Under Fed Conditions
DOC.criteria: 1. healthy male female subject Caucasian race 2. able read , write fully understand German language 3. give voluntary write informed consent first invasive screen examination procedure 4. age 18 45 year , inclusive 5 . BMI 18 28 kg/m2 6. good health determine medical history , physical examination , vital sign , electrocardiogram ( ECG , serum/urine biochemistry hematology ) 1. clinically relevant allergy ( except untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) drug hypersensitivity 2. know hypersensitivity one IMP substances 3. severe digestive disorder surgery digestive tract ( except appenÂ¬dectomy ) 4. clinically relevant renal disorder ( albuminuria , chronic infection ) 5. clinically relevant hepatic disorder 6. clinically relevant respiratory disorder 7. clinically relevant cardiovascular disorder , especially history ventricular tachycardia , ventricular fibrillation multifocal ventricular ectopics , history additional risk factor torsades de pointes ( TdP ) ( e.g . heart failure , hypokalemia , congenital long QTsyndrome ) 8. diabetes mellitus thyroid dysfunction endocrine disorder 9. malignancy 10. substance abuse addiction ( alcohol , illicit drug ) past 3 year 11. neurologic psychiatric illness 12. know predisposition bleeding ( e.g . active peptic ulceration , recent ( within 6 month ) haemorrhagic stroke , surgery within previous three month , proliferative diabetic retinopathy , poorly control hypertension )
